C1.name: Numerical Reasoning
C1.description: Ability to interpret and reason with quantitative information, analyze numerical data, and draw logical conclusions from statistical presentations

C2.name: Verbal Reasoning
C2.description: Capacity to understand, analyze, and evaluate written information and arguments to reach sound conclusions

C3.name: Abstract Reasoning
C3.description: Ability to identify patterns, logical rules, and relationships in complex, non-verbal information

C4.name: Working Memory
C4.description: Capacity to hold and manipulate information in mind while performing complex cognitive tasks

C5.name: Processing Speed
C5.description: Speed and accuracy of cognitive processing, particularly under time pressure

B1.name: Conscientiousness
B1.description: Reliability, organization, self-discipline, and attention to responsibilities and details

B2.name: Emotional Stability
B2.description: Ability to remain calm, composed, and resilient under pressure and in challenging situations

B3.name: Extraversion
B3.description: Tendency to be outgoing, assertive, and energized by social interaction and external stimulation

B4.name: Agreeableness
B4.description: Propensity to be cooperative, trusting, and considerate in interpersonal relationships

B5.name: Openness to Experience
B5.description: Willingness to engage with novel ideas, experiences, and unconventional approaches

W1.name: Achievement Orientation
W1.description: Drive to excel, set challenging goals, and persist in the face of obstacles to achieve success

W2.name: Attention to Detail
W2.description: Tendency to be thorough, precise, and careful in work tasks, noticing and correcting errors

W3.name: Adaptability
W3.description: Flexibility and comfort with change, ambiguity, and shifting priorities in work environments

W4.name: Team Collaboration
W4.description: Ability to work effectively with others, share information, and contribute to group objectives

W5.name: Decision Making
W5.description: Capacity to analyze information, weigh alternatives, and make sound judgments in work contexts

cognitive_skills.adverse_impact_risk: High - cognitive tests often show group differences

behavioral_skills.adverse_impact_risk: Low to moderate - personality measures generally show smaller group differences

work_style_skills.adverse_impact_risk: Low to moderate - context-specific behavioral measures
